name: Flourish - Revenge
description:
Background

Flourish - Revenge is a sequel to my first game Flourish. This is my first completed 3D game made for the GDFG Monthly Game Jam #3 (March 2021). The game takes place on a small farm where a boy, Timmy, hasn't been taking good care of his plants. The plants decide they're going to get revenge on Timmy and he must survive as long as he can while armed with his trusty flamethrower.

Gameplay

Kill as many plants as possible before you die.  

If plants get close to you, they will attack.  If you run out of health, you will die.

You have limited fuel, but fuel canisters will respawn around the map for you to pick up.

Controls

Movement - WASD

Fire Flamethrower - Left Mouse Button

Pause Game / Show Menu - Escape
